ResourceHeader.Description:
The GPS receiver in each tracking station within the International GNSS Service (IGS) global network generates raw orbit
                and tracking data.  Among a wide range of scientific and engineering applications and studies, these data help scientists monitor
                the ionosphere, improving and extending the International Earth Rotation Service (IERS) Terrestrial Reference Frame (ITRF).

Instrument.InvestigationName: Global Positioning Satellites for Ionosphere Monitoring
